Events.OnCreate:
(block ( (gateList (sysFindObject gSource "G -uncharted;")) ) (switch ; Make sure there are at least 2 gates (ls (count gateList) 2) (msnDestroy gSource)
; The two gates better be at least 150 light-seconds ; away from each other (ls (objGetDistance (@ gateList 0) (@ gateList 1)) 150) (msnDestroy gSource)
(block ( (gate1 (@ gateList 0)) (gate2 (@ gateList 1)) ) ; The nearest gate is the first gate (if (ls (objGetDistance aOwnerObj gate1) (objGetDistance aOwnerObj gate2)) (block (swap) (setq swap gate1) (setq gate1 gate2) (setq gate2 swap) ) ) (msnSetData gSource 'entryGate (objGetID gate1)) (msnSetData gSource 'exitGate (objGetID gate2)) (msnSetData gSource 'enemy (random (list 'marauders 'slavers))) ) ) )
Events.OnStarted:
(block ( (stargateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'entryGate))) (timeToGate (sysCalcTravelTime (objGetDistance gPlayerShip stargateObj) (shpGetMaxSpeed gPlayerShip))) )
; Set a timer for when the freighter comes in (msnAddTimerEvent gSource (+ (max timeToGate 600) (random 0 100)) "OnConvoyArrives") )
Events.OnConvoyArrives:
(block ( (startGate (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'entryGate))) (endGate (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'exitGate))) targetObj ) (switch (= (msnGetData gSource 'enemy) 'marauders) (block Nil ; create the main ship that will go from one stargate to the other (setq targetObj (sysCreateShip &scDrake; startGate &svMarauders;))
; create the escorts (for i 1 (random 3 6) (block (escort) (setq escort (sysCreateShip &scViking-II; startGate &svMarauders;)) (shpOrder escort 'escort targetObj) ) ) )
(block Nil ; create the transport that will go from one stargate to the other (setq targetObj (sysCreateShip &scSungTransport; startGate &svSung;)) (objAddItem targetObj (itmCreate &itSlaveCoffin; (random 10 20)))
; create the escorts (for i 1 (random 6 9) (block (escort) (setq escort (sysCreateShip &scWindSlaver; startGate &svSung;)) (shpOrder escort 'escort targetObj) ) ) ) ) (shpOrder targetObj 'gate endGate) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource targetObj) (msnSetData gSource 'targetID (objGetID targetObj))
; Refresh the target (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget:
(switch ; If we have a target ID, then attack it. (msnGetData gSource 'targetID) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'targetID)) 'attack)
; Otherwise, point to the stargate (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'entryGate)) 'dock) )

Language.Text:
Your mission is to intercept and destroy an enemy convoy.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: %payment%

You are in the command center surrounded by wall maps and scanner displays. The commanding officer of the fortress looks up from his charts:
"Are you looking for a mission, captain?"
"We have received information that a marauder convoy will be entering the system at %gateName%. Your mission is to destroy the convoy before it leaves the system."
"We have received information that a slaver convoy will be entering the system at %gateName%. Your mission is to destroy the convoy before it leaves the system."
Language.String: "Why don't you make yourself useful and get us some tea or something."
"What is your major malfunction!? Get back out there and complete your mission!"
"You screwed that mission all the way to Sol and back. You better hit the sims, pilot!"
"Good work, captain! That was an outstanding mission."
